channel.title: Home on SOUTHEN
channel.description: Recent content in Home on SOUTHEN

item.title: Procedures and Standards
item.description: We work with your team to adjust Project Controls and risk management processes, procedures and standards. Do not start from scratch: We provide and quickly implement processes, procedures and templates, including state-of-the-art business intelligence tools. Management culture: We help your contractors and subsidiaries to meet your parent company’s management systems needs. Project constrains: We help you identify and implement the adjustment that specific projects conditions make necessary in your management systems.

item.title: Projects Controls set up
item.description: We provide standard high-level descriptive analytics at no charge. Customization and deep-dive options are available. Projects' delay distribution. Distributions decomposition by uncertainty and impact of risks. High-level risks and historical influence of variables in projects performance. Descriptive analysis of risks and uncertainty at lower levels (custom). Statistics and level of confidence (custom).

item.title: Project controls team
item.description: Custom predictive analytics for portfolios, projects and critical milestones. Take advantage of a rich and transversal database. Adjusted level of confidence for distribution fits. Completion probabilities, P50, P80. Sensitivity analysis. Deep-dive analysis for key drivers. Influence of rare risk events.

item.title: Prescriptive analytics
item.description: To reduce bias in the decision-making process, we are developing vcubo.ai, an AI agent trained with the inputs and results of the decisions taken in past projects.

item.title: About
item.description: We are an open community of project controls and risk management specialists. We process large amounts of projects data to train machine learning models and provide management teams with discernment and more certain quantitative risk analyses. Contact us
